resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156631</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156631</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2128</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Integrating inquiry activities into physics instruction in a computer-based information technology environment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Integrierenanfrageaktivitäten in Physikanweisung
in einer rechnergestützten Informationstechnologieumgebung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activités d'intégration d'enquête dans 
l'instruction de physique dans un environnement sur ordinateur de 
technologie de l'information</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividades integrando do inquérito na 
instrução da física em um ambiente por computador da tecnologia de 
informação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività d'integrata di inchiesta in istruzione 
di fisica in un ambiente computerizzato di tecnologia 
dell'informazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητες έρευνας ενσωμάτωσης στην οδηγία 
φυσικής σε ένα βασισμένο σε υπολογιστή περιβάλλον τεχνολογίας 
πληροφοριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Actividades de la pregunta que integran en la 
instrucción de la física en un ambiente computarizado de la 
tecnología de información</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This study deals with the development, implementation and evaluation of an instructional intervention aimed at integrating inquiry activities in a computer-based information technology environment into high school physics instruction.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">information technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics teaching</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Studie beschäftigt die Entwicklung, die 
Implementierung und die Auswertung einer anweisenden Intervention, die
Anfrageaktivitäten in einer rechnergestützten 
Informationstechnologieumgebung in High School Physikanweisung 
integrierend angestrebt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette étude traite le développement, la mise en
place et l'évaluation d'une intervention d'instruction visée 
intégrant des activités d'enquête dans un environnement sur 
ordinateur de technologie de l'information dans l'instruction de 
physique de lycée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este estudo trata do desenvolvimento, da 
execução e da avaliação de uma intervenção instrutiva visada 
integrando atividades do inquérito em um ambiente por computador da 
tecnologia de informação na instrução da física da High School.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo studio si occupa dello sviluppo, 
dell'implementazione e della valutazione di un intervento didattico 
puntato su integrando le attività di inchiesta in un ambiente 
computerizzato di tecnologia dell'informazione nell'istruzione di 
fisica della High School.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μελέτη εξετάζει την ανάπτυξη, την εφαρμογή και
την αξιολόγηση μιας εκπαιδευτικής επέμβασης που στοχεύει στην 
ενσωμάτωση των δραστηριοτήτων έρευνας σε ένα βασισμένο σε 
υπολογιστή περιβάλλον τεχνολογίας πληροφοριών στην οδηγία 
φυσικής γυμνασίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este estudio se ocupa del desarrollo, de la 
puesta en práctica y de la evaluación de una intervención 
educacional dirigida integrando actividades de la pregunta en un 
ambiente computarizado de la tecnología de información en la 
instrucción de la física de la High School secundaria.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationstechnologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physikunterricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">technologie de l'information</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enseignement de physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tecnologia de informação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ensino da física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tecnologia dell'informazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">insegnamento di fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τεχνολογία πληροφοριών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διδασκαλία φυσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tecnología de información</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">enseñanza de la física</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
